lines.text: The last man I had stayed for several years. He'll tell you I was most accommodating. In fact, I still get letters from him. He's on an island somewhere in the Pacific. I think they call it Alcatraz.
I thought a little spot of this might refresh you before taking up your new duties. It's Chateauneuf 1924.
Gee, that's pretty old. Haven't you got anything new?
Well, there's nothing to it. All you have to do is look the lion straight in the eyes. Lions are afraid of that. I read that in a book.
But did the lion read the book?
Come Stanley, let no one say that we were afraid to die.
I don't care who says it.
We just like to see kids have fun.
